subject: Add hopeful tone, fix delivery tracking, and improve UX
body:
- Add 6 new tones: hopeful, grateful, proud, anxious, overwhelmed, curious (34 total)
- Change delivery indicator (✓✓) to trigger on home screen instead of chat screen
- Replace tabbed tone selector with vertical scrolling grid layout
- Fix tone tag colors not displaying in message bubbles (use inline styles)
- Update all tone colors to muted palette matching app theme
title: Add hopeful tone, fix delivery tracking, and improve UX
